knimeNode.name: Gradient Boosting Predictor (Regression)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Applies regression from a gradient boosting model.

fullDescription.intro: Applies regression from a gradient boosting model. The implementation follows the algorithms described in "Greedy Function Approximation: A Gradient Boosting Machine" by Jerome H. Friedman (1999)". For more information you can also take a look at this .
fullDescription.option: Check this option if you want to use a custom name for the column containing the prediction
Name of the output column containing the prediction.

ports.inPort: Gradient Boosting model as produced by Gradient Boosting Learner (Regression) node.
